job_title: Failure Analysis Product and Process Technician
job_description:

• 2+ years of experience in a laboratory environment using complex imaging tools and chemical handling.
• Associate of Applied Science (AAS) or Associate of Science (AS) degree in Mechatronics, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, Science, Physics, Mathematics, or Supply Chain Management or equivalent experience.
